name: Rabbit Race: Fun Racing Games
description:
Top 10 USA with TONS of downloads worldwide

Hop and race to the finish line as Tufts, the cute and lovable bunny that needs to prove he’s a great racer!

Help Tufts run against the 20 fastest rabbits across 20 fun locations. Watch as Tufts overcomes his differences to become the champion rabbit racer thanks to his best friend and Grandpa! Hop to the finish line and make all those who look down on Tufts realize that he is a special rabbit.

Play Rabbit Race using simple controls and race as rabbits like Tufts, Hunter and more. Enjoy fun levels with amusing storylines and hilarious racing bunnies that will make you cheer for our hero!

RABBIT RACE FEATURES:

Play Fun Racing Games
- Race using simple controls!
- There’s nothing to it – just tap left-right-left and win the race!

Prove Your Racing Skills on Story Mode
- Prove your speed as Tufts, Hunter and more as you race against other rabbits!
- Enjoy 20 fun levels that will crack you up for hours
- Race against 20 cartoon rabbits each with their own hilarious backstory
- Overcome your differences and become the champion bunny!

Race in Multiplayer Games
- Addicting multiplayer mode to play with your friends
- Challenge your friends to see who can hop to the finish line first!

Share Your Achievements
- Be speedy to earn all 14 achievements
- Compare your scores with friends on the leaderboard 
- Share your scores directly to Facebook & Twitter integration 

Hop to the finish line and become to the champion rabbit racer in Rabbit Race! Race against other rabbits as Tufts or challenge your friends to fun multiplayer races!

Download now to get racing!

= If you love this game, you will love Snail Race =

App Store Quotes:
"my little sister loves it so much"

"I can’t put my iPod down after buying this. One of my most favorite games."

"This game is really fun, with the cute rabbits, with nice and cool graphics and with its multiplayer feature, I will always be excited to play it. Two thumbs up to the developers. Good job! : )"
